name: Keep it in
description:
Try to keep the ball from leaving the screen! How long will you last? (It's harder than it looks)

Made for Minijam 62: Colors. The limitation is that all animations must have 2 frames without easing.

How to play: 

-For an ideal experience, play on fullscreen. You can set the game to fullscreen in the game's settings.

-Hold left-click somewhere to materialize the paddle, just make sure there's nothing in the way!

-Release left-click to de-materialize the paddle. You can't move the paddle while it's materialized!

-The ball moves fast when blue and slow when red.

-Diamonds will copy their color onto the ball, then swap their own color.

-You can get extra points from bouncing the ball while it's blue
